attributes.action: Require all UK "Public Servants" to be accountable to ethical scrutiny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ethics are fundamental. All prolonged "mistakes" relect either abuse or incompetence. We need a standards board for everyone. That should exclude all those who are members or associated with any political or religious groups, all civil servants and anyone all lobyists. Let's have an ethical society, not an abusive one.
